channel.title: 2 Questions
channel.description: 1) How do you make it so that runes are not needed to cast spells/teleport 2) How do I edit the text that appears when I advance a thieving level from Line1 Line2

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Just go through all of your spells and delete the hasitemamount stuff

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

case 17: //Thieving sendFrame164(4261); sendFrame126("Stealing is Wrong! but your good at it. Gratz.", 6262); sendFrame126("Your theiving level is now "+playerLevel[17]+" .", 6263); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level."); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[17] == 99) { sendMessage("You are a BAD person. type ::thievingcape"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" just got 99 thieving!"; } NpcDialogueSend = true; break; thats to fix your thieving problem look for something like that and replace the Line1 and line2 with congratulations go in to ur teleport cfg to fix your no runes for teleporting

Read full topic
